sections.purpose: To store samples and chemicals under vacuum in a dry environment.
sections.scope: Applicable to sample storage in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Ensure the desiccant is active and the flange is greased.
Place the sample inside and slide the lid to seal.
Connect the vacuum pump to the stopcock and turn it ON.
Slowly open the stopcock to evacuate the chamber.
Close the stopcock and turn OFF the pump.
To open, slowly bleed air into the chamber through the stopcock.
Slide the lid off carefully to retrieve the sample.
precautions: Inspect the glass for any chips or cracks before applying vacuum.
Release the vacuum very slowly to prevent disturbing the sample.
Use a protective screen or safety cage for vacuum work.
Do not lift the desiccator by the lid knob.
Keep the stopcock well-greased for a perfect seal.
